title: Chainsaw Series
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

See sign on bottom, incised: [Mark Lindquist/ 1986/ Maple B
description: conical shape; small foot; rough top edge with some exposed bark; rough, feather-like flutes at interior; various sized smooth and rough ribs on exterior, with six burned arcing gouges; horizontal split on one side
creditline: Gift of Jane and Arthur Mason
